name: Ain't That A Bite
description:
Ain’t That a Bite is a fusion of twin stick shooter and tower defence, as players battle hordes of undead to protect their stash of zombie cure before they can escape. The key to your survival is the tactical use of turrets and other defences such as walls, decoys and bombs; but will that be enough to hold off the ever-increasing waves of varying zombie types?
